title: Working Drawing for 'Quartet'
marks:
Signature; Date; Title

 LL: [Nielsen 1979 Working drawing Quartet]
description: Symmetrical abstraction featuring four overlapping quadrilateral objects; all the same shape but with different patterns and colors; predominant colors: blue, orange, red, gold
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
